metadata.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling mother's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling mother of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

0.speaker: Rozes Kallista
0.text: The priests will open the temple up again, you'll see! They're good people - holy people.

1.speaker: Rozes Kallista
1.text: If you're hungry, you can wait with us. A priest might come out with some scraps if we're lucky.
